common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to get order detail.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"order_sn_list","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"201214JAJXU6G7,201214JASXYXY6","key":"yktnJS","type":"string","description":"The set of order_sn. If there are multiple order_sn, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]"},{"description":"

Compatible parameter during migration period, send True will let API support PENDING status and return  pending_terms, send False or don’t send will fallback to old logic

","name":"request_order_status_pending","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":"False","key":"HCMwQxi"},{"name":"response_optional_fields","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"total_amount","key":"pmfDfSB","type":"string","description":"

a response fields you want to get. Please select from the below response parameters. If you input an object field, all the params under it will be included automatically in the response. If there are multiple response fields you want to get, you need to use English comma to connect them. Available values: buyer_user_id,buyer_username,estimated_shipping_fee,recipient_address,actual_shipping_fee ,goods_to_declare,note,note_update_time,item_list,pay_time,dropshipper, dropshipper_phone,split_up,buyer_cancel_reason,cancel_by,cancel_reason,actual_shipping_fee_confirmed,buyer_cpf_id,fulfillment_flag,pickup_done_time,package_list,shipping_carrier,payment_method,total_amount,buyer_username,invoice_data,order_chargeable_weight_gram,return_request_due_date,edt,payment_info

"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"a8e1b94f51d64540bf5762abe7783073","type":"string","name":"request_id","key":"knhSidB","description":"The identifier for an API request for error tracking."},{"sample":"common.error_auth","type":"string","name":"error","key":"hQrwJXr","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened."},{"sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","name":"message","key":"wWRxadQ","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened."},{"description":"Detail informations you are querying.","sample":"","key":"aeDsNtf","type":"object","children":[{"description":"The list of orders.","sample":"","key":"YcpkWTG","type":"object[]","children":[{"sample":"2404098R48U37H","type":"string","name":"order_sn","key":"FdNdrBE","description":"Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for an order.\t"},{"sample":"VN","type":"string","name":"region","key":"znWdYDM","description":"Return by default. The two-digit code representing the region where the order was made.\t"},{"sample":"VND","type":"string","name":"currency","key":"ctZkRAR","description":"Return by default. The three-digit code representing the currency unit for which the order was paid.\t"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"cod","key":"tNrZZsm","description":"Return by default. This value indicates whether the order was a COD (cash on delivery) order.\t"},{"sample":"1004.0","type":"float","name":"total_amount","key":"bRTcNhC","description":"The total amount paid by the buyer for the order. This amount includes the total sale price of items, shipping cost beared by buyer; and offset by Shopee promotions if applicable. This value will only return after the buyer has completed payment for the order.\t"},{"description":"

The list of pending terms, possible values: SYSTEM_PENDING for order under Shopee internal processing, KYC_PENDING for order under KYC checking(TW CB order only)

","name":"pending_terms","sample":"[\"SYSTEM_PENDING\", \"KYC_PENDING\"]","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"apkdBHp"},{"sample":"CANCELLED","type":"string","name":"order_status","key":"WpwGmxx","description":"Return by default. Enumerated type that defines the current status of the order.\t"},{"sample":"Standard Delivery","type":"string","name":"shipping_carrier","key":"BhcFznK","description":"

The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items. If logistics_channel_id is 90021 or 90026, service_code will be appended.

"},{"sample":"Bank Transfer","type":"string","name":"payment_method","key":"BkcWRMX","description":"The payment method that the buyer selected to pay for the order. Applicable values: See Data Definition- Payment Methods.\t"},{"sample":"4.0","type":"float","name":"estimated_shipping_fee","key":"QziPpPS","description":"The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard.\t"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"message_to_seller","key":"pBDciTe","description":"Return by default. Message to seller.\t"},{"sample":"1607930885","type":"timestamp","name":"create_time","key":"siEpsdW","description":"Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the order was created.\t"},{"sample":"1608134691","type":"timestamp","name":"update_time","key":"NfnSiwA","description":"Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of order, such as order status changed from 'Paid' to 'Completed'.\t"},{"sample":"2","type":"int32","name":"days_to_ship","key":"RpRsPy","description":"Return by default. Shipping preparation time set by the seller when listing item on Shopee.\t"},{"sample":"1608103685","type":"int32","name":"ship_by_date","key":"ziFNJkh","description":"Return by default. The deadline to ship out the parcel.\t"},{"sample":"9193214","type":"int32","name":"buyer_user_id","key":"GxJiPWN","description":"

The user id of buyer of this order, will be empty if it is a non-integrated order in TW region.

"},{"sample":"Tom","type":"string","name":"buyer_username","key":"wWBmypM","description":"

The name of buyer, will be masked as \"****\" if it is a non-integrated order in TW region.

"},{"description":"

This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address.
Different parameters might be masked according to each market and kind of seller.

For TW region integrated channel orders will be all masked as \"****\". More details may refer the announcement.

","sample":"","key":"mSzYkJZ","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"Max","type":"string","name":"name","key":"RfbSanr","description":"Recipient's name for the address.\t"},{"sample":"3828203","type":"string","name":"phone","key":"XdhMwG","description":"

This value is accurate ONLY AFTER the order trackingNo is generated, please capture this value AFTER your retrieve the trackingNo.\t"},{"sample":"haha","type":"string","name":"note","key":"bdXKGEw","description":"The note seller made for own reference.\t"},{"sample":"1608103685","type":"timestamp","name":"note_update_time","key":"ykWXjT","description":"Update time for the note.\t"},{"description":"This object contains the detailed breakdown for the result of this API call.\t","sample":"","key":"KMKhYxy","type":"object[]","children":[{"sample":"2600144043","type":"int64","name":"item_id","key":"DSZEWpK","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an item."},{"sample":"backpack","type":"string","name":"item_name","key":"iirtTxz","description":"The name of the item."},{"sample":"sku","type":"string","name":"item_sku","key":"cfiNTQj","description":" A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.\t"},{"sample":"0","type":"int64","name":"model_id","key":"KQBbfmj","description":"ID of the model that belongs to the same item.\t"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"model_name","key":"jMWmhZT","description":"Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer models of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate model. Each model can have a different quantity and price.\t"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"model_sku","key":"pSbjeds","description":"A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are models of one item in Shopee Listings.\t"},{"sample":"1","type":"int32","name":"model_quantity_purchased","key":"WWsrKba","description":"The number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.\t"},{"sample":"1000.0","type":"float","name":"model_original_price","key":"mSJktND","description":"The original price of the item in the listing currency.\t"},{"sample":"1000.0","type":"float","name":"model_discounted_price","key":"nFDMTHk","description":"The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. If there is no discount, this value will be same as that of model_original_price. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0 as by design bundle deal discount will not be breakdown to item/model level. Due to technical restriction, the value will return the price before bundle deal if we don't configure it to 0. Please call GetEscrowDetails if you want to calculate item-level discounted price for bundle deal item.\t"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"wholesale","key":"QijJCy","description":"This value indicates whether buyer buy the order item in wholesale price.\t"},{"sample":"12.0","type":"float","name":"weight","key":"shYcNGS","description":"The weight of the item\t"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"add_on_deal","key":"GzyRWTj","description":"To indicate if this item belongs to an addon deal.\t"},{"sample":"false","type":"boolean","name":"main_item","key":"ryymsMe","description":"To indicate if this item is main item or sub item. True means main item, false means sub item.\t"},{"sample":"0","type":"int64","name":"add_on_deal_id","key":"QQhkQKH","description":"A unique ID to distinguish groups of items in Cart, and Order. (e.g. AddOnDeal)\t"},{"sample":"flash_sale","type":"string","name":"promotion_type","key":"hbbXDcC","description":"

Available type：product_promotion, flash_sale, bundle_deal, add_on_deal_main, add_on_deal_sub.


For items which attend multiple promotions will only show one promotion, the order of priority is: 

bundle_deal > add_on_deal_main > add_on_deal_sub > product_promotion >flash_sale

"},{"sample":"0","type":"int64","name":"promotion_id","key":"EYtNamd","description":"The ID of the promotion.\t"},{"sample":"2600144043","type":"int64","name":"order_item_id","key":"GreGQck","description":"The identify of order item."},{"sample":"0","type":"int32","name":"promotion_group_id","key":"mPGEAJc","description":"The identify of product promotion."},{"description":"Image info of the product.","sample":"","key":"tKHRsRb","type":"object","children":[{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"image_url","key":"tnMkaHD","description":"The image url of the product. Indicate whether order will be fulfilled using advance fulfilment stock or not. If value is true, order will be matched with a booking and seller should not arrange shipment.

","name":"advance_package","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"bebEzhP"},{"description":"

This field represents the deadline for buyers to initiate returns and refunds after order is completed.


The “return_request_due_date” response parameter will be returned if the requested order meets ALL the conditions below:

- The status of the order is COMPLETED

- The return refund eligibility of the order is true


If you have any questions related to the function of \"returns and refunds after order is completed,\" please refer to the following link: https://seller.shopee.tw/edu/article/18474

","name":"return_request_due_date","sample":"","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"KJSGcbz"},{"description":"

","name":"payment_info","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"aYySQRG","children":[{"description":"

","name":"payment_method","sample":"Debit Card","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jaeEDjw"},{"description":"

[Only for BR] CNPJ of the payment processor handling the transaction.

","name":"payment_processor_register","sample":"38.372.267/0001-82","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YecyhQW"},{"description":"

[Only for BR] Card brand for credit or debit transactions, such as VISA, MASTER, etc. Empty string for Pix payments.

","name":"card_brand","sample":"VISA","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nwEAXaa"},{"description":"

[Only for BR] Payment authorization code generated by the bank or payment processor to validate the transaction.

","name":"transaction_id","sample":"951679","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SCMbHBd"}]},{"description":"

To indicate if this order is buyer self collection at store order

","name":"is_buyer_shop_collection","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"hbrRtfG"},{"description":"

The image url of the buyer self collection at the store.

","name":"buyer_proof_of_collection","sample":"","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"XFWeyFG"}],"name":"order_list"}],"name":"response"},{"sample":"","type":"string[]","name":"warning","key":"aWcBKw","description":"Indicate warning message you should take care."}]}
